name: The Gambler
intro:
A risk-taker who plays the odds, not the sheriff. Usually honest, but when he sees a big opportunity, he goes all-in.

A charismatic gambler who believes in luck and timing. He's honest most of the time, building trust and reputation. But when the cards align perfectly - when he gets multiple of the same contraband - he can't resist the big play. He smuggles boldly with no bribe, betting on his honest reputation to carry him through.
tells_honest: his hands are relaxed and open
tells_lying: his hands play with the cards in his hand
appearance: A well-dressed man in his thirties with slicked-back dark hair and a charming smile. He wears a fine vest with playing cards tucked in the pocket and dice hanging from a chain. His eyes sparkle with mischief and confidence.
